languages.text: This value is added to the chance of hitting partial cover when aiming at an enemy for all the characters in the party.
languages.original_text: Число, прибавляемое к шансу попасть в частичное укрытие при стрельбе в противника для всех персонажей в отряде.

traits.locale_text: This value is added to the chance of hitting partial cover when aiming at an enemy for all the characters in the party.
This value is added to the chance of hitting half cover when aiming at an enemy for all the characters in the party.
This value is added to the chance of hitting half cover when aiming at an enemy for all the characters in the party.

languages.text: Число, прибавляемое к шансу попасть в частичное укрытие при стрельбе в противника для всех персонажей в отряде.

languages.text: Dieser Wert wird der Chance zugefügt, für alle Charaktere der Gruppe beim Anvisieren eines Feindes in teilweiser Deckung zu treffen.
languages.original_text: This value is added to the chance of hitting partial cover when aiming at an enemy for all the characters in the party.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Wert wird der Chance zugefügt, für alle Charaktere der Gruppe beim Anvisieren eines Feindes in halber Deckung zu treffen.

languages.text: Cette valeur est ajoutée aux chances de tous les personnages du groupe de toucher une couverture partielle lorsqu'un ennemi est visé.
languages.original_text: This value is added to the chance of hitting partial cover when aiming at an enemy for all the characters in the party.

traits.locale_text: Cette valeur est ajoutée aux chances de tous les personnages du groupe d'infliger un coup à une couverture partielle lorsqu'un ennemi est visé.

languages.text: 队伍所有成员使用远程攻击，攻击躲在半身掩体中的敌人时，这个数值会加在命中掩体的几率上。
languages.original_text: This value is added to the chance of hitting partial cover when aiming at an enemy for all the characters in the party.

traits.locale_text: 队伍所有成员使用远程攻击，攻击躲在半身掩体中的敌人时，这个数值会加在命中掩体的几率上。

languages.text: Este valor se añade a la probabilidad de impactar en cobertura parcial al apuntar a un enemigo para todos los personajes del grupo.
languages.original_text: This value is added to the chance of hitting partial cover when aiming at an enemy for all the characters in the party.

traits.locale_text: Este valor se añade a la probabilidad de impactar en cobertura parcial al apuntar a un enemigo para todos los personajes del grupo.

languages.text: この値は、部隊内の全てのキャラクターが敵を狙った時に半遮蔽物に命中する確率に加算される。
languages.original_text: This value is added to the chance of hitting partial cover when aiming at an enemy for all the characters in the party.

traits.locale_text: この値は、部隊内の全てのキャラクターが敵を狙った時にハーフカバーに命中する確率に加算される。

languages.text: Gruptaki karakterler düşmana nişan aldığında kısmi siperi vurma olasılıklarına eklenen değer.
